author: chayanit
body:
#### PR description:

This PR aims to fix the restriction of TaskName added by WMCore in #9260 for RelVals injection. Mainly due to GEN fragment convention. The solution is to check if the TaskName is greater than 50 characters then we reduce by

- Check and remove Tuning (TuneCUETP8M1, TuneCP5, forSTEAM)
- Check again and remove Generator (pythia8,powhegEmissionVeto, aMCatNLO)
- Check again and replace GenSimFull to GS, GammaGamma to GG, Bottom to B 

#### PR validation:

Local test is done with one of the longest TaskName "DisplacedSUSY_stopToBottom_M_300_1000mm_TuneCUETP8M1_13TeV_pythia8_2018_GenSimFull"

`runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 10884.0`
title: Ad-hoc fix of Relvals TaskName more than 50 characters
